bio:
Hello! I'm Aman Kumar, a passionate and curious Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) student. I’m currently in my early semesters, building a strong foundation in computer science and programming.

I have hands-on experience with Python and C, and I’m comfortable working on logic-building, basic data structures, and problem-solving tasks. Alongside this, I’ve started exploring the basics of cloud computing and have a growing interest in AWS (Amazon Web Services) and how cloud platforms can power real-world applications.

I'm actively looking for opportunities — workshops, internships, or collaborations — that help me apply what I’m learning in college to practical, real-world scenarios.

Apart from academics, I enjoy staying updated with the latest in tech, participating in coding challenges, and working on personal growth.
